subject: Matti pr Sajda
description: Matti pr sajda Nabi (sawaw) krtey thy wo sabit hota hai

subject: Hazrat Ali | Paoon ka masah
description: Hazrat Ali k wazu ka zikr hai magar Sar Paoon ki baat adhi bayaan ki..

subject: Hazrat Ali | Paoon ka masah
description: Yaha bayaan howa k Hazrat Ali ne farmaya k Nabi (sawaw) paoon k opper hissey ka masah karte thy, Smartness ye ki urdu tarjumey main Socks/jootey ka word add kardia.. jb k arabi main Paoon tha. --But-- Sunan Abu Dawood main yahi ahadees SOCKS arabic main hain --Musanib abhi shaiba-- main direct paoon pr masah ka mojood hai... mere pass book nhi tu direct check nhi kia

subject: Hazrat Ali | Kharey ho k pani peena
description: Topic Kharey ho k paani peena - Masjid-e-Koofa main Hazrat Ali ne kharey ho k paani piya aur bataya k kuch loog makroh samajte hain jb k Nabi (sawaw) bhi aise krte thy

subject: Hazrat Ayesha | Yusuf k gird aurteen | women around Yusuf
description: End main Bibi ayesha se Allah k Rasool (sawaw) ne farmaya k tum yusuf k gird aurtoon ki tarha ho yaan aziyat dene wali

subject: Hazrat Fatimah as | Gazabnaak | Jannat
description: Hazrat Fatima (as) Jannat ki aurtoo ki sardaar hain -  Fatima (as) Mere (sawaw) jism ka tukra hai, jisney usey(as) gazabnaak kia usne muje (sawaw) gazabnaak kia.

subject: Meaning badalna | alaihis salam | Bibi Fatimah as
description: Yaha arabi main Dadi Fatimah k naam k sath Alaihis-salam hai pr URDU main Raziallah kardia.. jb k Bibi Ayesha k naam k sath kuch nhi

subject: Ks ki Pervi / Itaba karain? Jo janta hai yaa jo rah nhi janta
description: Jo sahih rah batata hai zyada haqdar hai k uski pervi ki jaye YAA jo khud rah nhi pata - Tm kese faisle karte ho?

subject: Khalifa - Nabi kisey Khalifa banatey
